definitions.body: [[שְׁכֶם]] ´[[בֶּן־חֲמוֹר הַח]] Ge 34:2 (P), cf. ´[[חִבְעוֹן הַח]] Ge 36:2 (but rd. rather [[הַחׂרִי]] Ol Di cf. LXX Jos 9:7).

c. art. as n.pr.coll. [[הַחִוִּי]] the Hivvites ‘begotten’ by Canaan Ge 10:17 = 1Ch 1:15; esp. in list of Canaanit. peoples displaced by Hebrews Ex 3:8, Ex 3:17, Ex 13:5, Ex 23:23, Ex 23:28, Ex 33:2, Ex 34:11, De 7:1, De 20:17, Jos 3:10, Jos 9:1, Jos 12:8, Jos 24:11 (all JED), Ju Jdg 3:5, 1Ki 9:20 = 2Ch 8:7; cf. [[וְהַכְּנַעֲנִי]] ´[[עָרֵי הַח]] 2Sa 24:7 (note [[מִבְחַר־חׂר]], [[חִידוֹן]] just preceding); applied specif. to Gibeonites Jos 9:7 (JE), Jos 11:19 (D).—In Jos 11:3, Ju Jdg 3:3 rd. prob. [[הַחִתִּי]] for [[הַחִוִּי]] We Mey Bu:Urg 350 v. (partly) LXX, Dr on De 7:1.
